item.title: Jenkins Workspace and Maven cache local persistent storage
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Create local storage Since this is a test cluster, we can directly use local volume storage here; Since the user running in the jenkins server here is jenkins, and the uid of jenkins is 1000, we need to grant /opt/jenkins_agent/ and /opt/jenkins_maven/ permissions to jenkins in advance on node1 Copy 1 2 chown 1000.1000 -R /opt/jenkins_agent -R chown 1000.1000 -R /opt/jenkins_maven/ -R Local storage: agent-pv-pvc.yaml Copy 1 2 3 4
